meanings: 확실하다 [틀림없다] certain, sure, secure, positive, [믿을 만하다] reliable, trustworthy, [확정되다] definite.
sure, certain, confident, positive, definite; (명백하다) indisputable

vlive.korean: 확실? Are you sure? 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : 용콩별콩의 제일 빠른 여름방학 3부
확실하니까 - 저희가 너무 화장을 해가지고 괜찮아요? For sure... - But we put on a lot of makeup. 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 룸메즈의 간식타임!
vlive.english: For sure... - But we put on a lot of makeup.

vlive.korean: [1번이 확실합니다] - 1번 오토네 오토 - 기차 만든 사람 아니야? [1 is answer for sure.] - Number 1. It is Otto. - Isn't he the one who made train? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.110
vlive.english: [1 is answer for sure.] - Number 1. It is Otto. - Isn't he the one who made train?

vlive.korean: 확실한 이유가 없었던 것 같아요 뭐라고 해야 되지? for me to go to an arts school. What should I say? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 쫑알쫑알 해도 돼요?🦋
vlive.english: for me to go to an arts school. What should I say?

examples.korean: the solidity of his support for his staff 발음듣기 자기 직원들에 대한 그의 확실한 지원 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the solidity of his support for his staff 발음

examples.korean: He is a sure bet for the presidential nominations. 발음듣기 그는 대통령 지명자로 확실한 사람이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He is a sure bet for the presidential nominations. 발음

examples.korean: Lemming-like we rushed into certain disaster. 발음듣기 레밍과 같이 우리는 확실해 보이는 참사를 향해 뛰어들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Lemming-like we rushed into certain disaster. 발음

examples.korean: Vague objections to the system solidified into firm opposition. 발음듣기 그 제도에 대한 희미한 반감이 확실한 반대로 굳어졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Vague objections to the system solidified into firm opposition. 발음

examples.korean: Is it definite that he’s leaving? 발음듣기 그가 떠난다는 게 확실한 건가요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Is it definite that he’s leaving? 발음
